```{r model, collapse=TRUE}
options(digits = 4)
fit <- lm(mpg~cyl, data = mtcars)
b   <- coef(fit)
summary(fit)
```

Below is a scatter plot with the regression line.

```{r plot, fig.height=5}
par(mar = c(4, 4, 1, 1))
plot(mpg~cyl, data = mtcars, pch = 19, col = 'gray')
abline(fit, col = 'red', lwd = 2)
```
